title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Children, Disability and Equality) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister child disability equality) order 2025

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. Michael Brennan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Michael Brennan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Children, Disability and Equality, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Children, Disability and Equality, 
with effect from 23 January 2025.
text_norm: 2 michael brennan particular whose address deposited office department child disability equality appointed special adviser minister child disability equality effect 23 january 2025

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. Aisling Dunne, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Aisling Dunne, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Children, Disability and Equality, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Children, Disability and Equality, with 
effect from 28 April 2025. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 May, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [307] 3
